p:
Regarding the oxygen-ion conduction, to the best of our knowledge, it is still not clear whether V O or O
i is the dominant oxygen defect in the garnet-type oxides. In order to compare the migration barrier energies of V O and O
i , we employ the climbing image nudged elastic band (CI-NEB) method
20, 21 for several candidates of migration paths. As the migrating oxygen defects, a doubly charged oxygen vacancy ( V O 2+) and O
i
2âˆ’ are employed.
